typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Film as string,
		Genre as string,
		{Lead Studio} as string,
		{Audience score %} as string,
		Profitability as string,
		{Rotten Tomatoes %} as string,
		{Worldwide Gross} as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoveDataset
MoveDataset derive(TimestampInsert = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
